history.title: Our Story
history.subtitle: Where it all began.
history.heading: From a shared idea to a purpose-driven reality
history.text1: KORA was founded in 2026 by three friends from the Canary Islands with a clear vision: to create an agency that not only executes, but thinks. Tired of generic solutions, we decided to build a space where strategy and digital craftsmanship come together.
history.text2: Our purpose is simple. In an increasingly automated world, we want digital tools to help brands connect with people in an authentic way. We are not looking to build "websites", we aim to create platforms that tell stories, solve problems, and generate real growth. We want to be the technological partner that truly understands your business and drives it forward.

team.title: The Team
team.subtitle: Behind every project, there are people. Get to know us.

iriem.bio: Passionate about creating digital experiences that not only look great but work flawlessly. His attention to detail and user-focused mindset ensure that every project tells a compelling and cohesive visual story.

fernando.bio: With both an analytical and creative mindset, Fernando turns ideas into clean and efficient code. He ensures that technology not only works but impresses, always seeking the best technical solution for every challenge.

fabio.bio: The team's strategist. Fabio ensures that every action aligns with business objectives. His ability to understand client needs and translate them into opportunities makes him the engine of growth.
